ComicInfo.Penciller: Federico Sabbatini,Juan Bobillo,Ryan Jampole,Ryan Jampole,Juan Bobillo,Federico Sabbatini
ComicInfo.Summary: Riverdale is known to be a hotbed of strange happenings and paranormal activity... always has been and always will be. Take a look as a few extra-special case files are opened that highlight the weird occurrences that happen in the small, quiet town, in a one-shot anthology that's equal parts The X-Files and Black Mirror.
ComicInfo.Title: A Wrinkle in Time; Bingo Wilkin Day; Betty Cooper: Alien Hunter
ComicInfo.Writer: Frank Tieri,Joanne Starer,Ron Robbins,Ron Robbins,Frank Tieri
